name: Cascade Down
description:
Description

You are going down, and the only thing you can do is turning left and right.

However, changing direction is NOT FREE. You need to pick up yellow cubes to refuel or your movements would become clunky and inertia would probably get the better of you.

  • Cascade Down is a 3D-platformer that has 5 relatively hard levels. 
  • Movement is physics based, so take inertia into concern.
  • Ability to smoothly changing directions is limited. Pick up yellow cubes to refuel.
  • Avoid static/moving obstacles and don't fall!
  • Game would enter slow-motion if you are almost hit by an obstacle, so you would have extra time to react and it looks cool!
  • Have Fun!!!
Controls

Keyboard: A D or Left/Right Arrows

Controller: Any horizontal axis

How To Play

Play the online version above or at this github page

Or download the windows version.

If you are having errors with the online version in Safari, try playing it in a different browser!

Changes 18/04/2022

Adjustment to difficulty of all levels -- they were simply too difficult and frustrating.

Achievement system added -- finish all levels to get an achievement. (or die a lot of times)
